Posts.Content: Please look up Inflammatory Breast Cancer on the internet. A friend of mine had it in one breast. She also had lymph node swelling on her neck and under her arm pit. After 3 months of going to a doctor who treated her for breast milk infection which she didn't have. She also had a mammogram but it doesn't show anything. You need to see a specialist A.S.A.P. check website:[url]http://www.REMOVED.com[/url] I don't think you have cancer JUDY
Posts.Title: Breast pain and discharge

Posts.Content: I don't have cancer in any of my family background. I found a lump in my breast-- I skipped one year mamogram.. I had a biopsy done it was easy they have me a valium 10 minutes before the prodecure I felt nothing and was very elaxed. Well I did have cancer in feb 05. I had it removed and I'm glad they did because there was more cancer in it and didn't show on the mammogram. HAVE THAT BIOPSY DONE AS SSON AS POSSIBLE--every day that goes by counts... Judy
